settings.default_text:
Digestion & Whole Gut
Hoof & Coat
Energy & Muscle

settings.content:
If your horse is showing intense or persistent signs of poor gut health such as regular loose manure, anxiety that doesn’t resolve, spooky behaviour, dull coat or hooves, or unexplained low energy, it's likely their gut needs more than just maintenance.

Built on the same foundation as DigestiveEQ but formulated to have increased gastric buffering and with TruEquine delivering a higher concentration of postbiotics. It also contains higher levels of amino acids, an additional amino acid and an additional digestive enzyme, making DigestiveHP a high performing gut support for horses under stress, in high work, or recovering from serious digestive challenges.

Vet-recommended and science-backed, DigestiveHP targets issues when standard support just isn’t enough.

settings.heading: Product Description
settings.content:
DigestiveHP is built for horses under intense stress, in high work, competition or recovering from digestive challenges.

Visible signs of optimal gut health include firm manure, shiny coat, healthy hooves, enhanced stress resilience, calmer behaviour and consistent performance.

This advanced formulation works from the foregut to the hindgut, supporting the full 30 metre long digestive tract - ideal when everyday support just isn’t enough. Always consult your veterinarian or equine nutritionist for specific advice for your horse.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content: Red Marine Algae, Lucerne Leaf Meal, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae pre & postbiotics, Mycotoxin Binder, Threonine, Magnesium Hydroxide, Magnesium Oxide, Glutamine, Carbohydrase Enzymes, Phytase Enzymes, Proline, Leucine, Serine.

settings.heading: How To Use
settings.content:
Slowly introduce DigestiveHP over 14 days, especially for horses prone to digestive issues like colic and diarrhoea, or those prone to Laminitis.

  • Days 1 to 4: ¼ serving
  • Days 5 to 8: ½ serving
  • Days 9 to 13: ¾ serving
  • Day 14 onwards: full serving

Serving Size: 65g or 1 scoop (included)

Daily serve recommendations:

  • Up to 200kg bodyweight: ¾ scoop
  • 200-400kg: 1.5 scoops
  • 400-600kg: 2 scoops
  • 600+: 3 scoops

We recommend using StressPaste for the first five days when introducing DigestiveHP for the first time.

settings.heading: Auto-Ship & Save
settings.content:
With Auto-Ship, you never have to worry about running out when you need it most.

You’ll receive your chosen quantity of DigestiveHP at your chosen frequency.

You’ll also save 10% on the price with every single delivery and receive free shipping. Those savings add up, especially if you have multiple horses.

You can cancel or edit your Auto-Ship service at any time.

settings.text_6KWzbPGpboOXaSIw: Strengthen from Within. Power the Whole Horse.
settings.text_Xo1rAFBKreKismZV:
Horses under intense physical or environmental stress - like training, travel, or high-grain diets - often face gut imbalances that impact their overall health.

DigestiveHP provides targeted support for these high-stress situations, offering a stronger formulation than DigestiveEQ to help maintain normal gut function and wellbeing.

settings.text_eCzR5Q9JwD1Ul0E3: Focus and energy pre and post performance

settings.text_vFaRv4r8taJEhhrT:
DigestiveHP was developed in collaboration with leading microbiologists, veterinarians and equine nutritionists to deliver targeted gut support for performance horses.

Each ingredient is scientifically validated to provide measurable benefits at the microbial and cellular levels, ensuring real, lasting results.
settings.text_zBvXNLq0axdicXVB:
Dual-Action pH Buffers in DigestiveHP combine red marine algae, renowned for its open honeycomb structure and superior buffering capacity with magnesium hydroxide, a fast-acting, research-backed buffer.

Together, they help neutralise excess stomach acid and support a balanced pH and create a longer-lasting protective layer in the stomach - unlike short-acting antacids that offer only temporary relief.
settings.text_VzTtLUvZR9mt8dQT:
DigestiveHP contains an advanced blend of prebiotics and a next-generation TruEquine™ postbiotic that work together to protect and repair the gut. It features a natural postbiotic technology that delivers targeted metabolites to support gut health, helping horses better manage stress (including post-exercise cortisol) and maintain cartilage integrity - supporting overall resilience and performance.

TruEquine™ is a patented, next-generation postbiotic trusted by veterinarians and backed by over 80 years of fermentation expertise, 40 years of equine research, and 17 peer-reviewed studies. 

What TruEquine™ delivers:

• Promotes a resilient, balanced gut microbiome

• Enhances nutrient absorption and fibre digestion

• Supports a strong, responsive immune system

• Helps horses better cope with stress, transport, and environmental changes

• Speeds up post-exercise recovery with proven metabolic benefits
settings.text_FsCFRhA5HWJdOHgT:
Digestive enzymes enhance feed breakdown and improve nutrient absorption - essential for horses needing precision digestive support. Horses naturally have low and variable levels of the enzymes needed to digest starch efficiently, which can lead to undigested grain and digestive upset.

DigestiveHP contains concentrated carbohydrase enzymes derived from fermentation sources. These enzymes are backed by research to significantly improve starch digestion, especially when grains are part of the diet.
settings.text_iOSEzzcOfMo1wfs7: DigestiveHP contains the same four amino acids as DigestiveEQ: L-Threonine, L-Glutamine, L-Proline, and L-Serine but with higher levels of Proline and Serine, plus the added benefit of an additional amino acid, Leucine. These amino acids work together to support natural mucin production, maintain gut wall integrity, and aid in muscle development.
settings.text_6jIt8hx7GmkzUEih: DigestiveHP provides a carefully balanced Calcium to Magnesium ratio to support optimal nutrient absorption and overall health. An imbalanced ratio, especially with excess calcium, can interfere with magnesium uptake, potentially leading to weakened bones, poor growth, and impaired energy metabolism. Maintaining the right balance is essential for bone strength, healthy nervous system function, and balanced behaviour.
settings.text_N25vaQvZbi3LA22Q: DigestiveHP includes Elitox®, a dual-action (toxin deactivation and binding) mycotoxin binder designed to support horses exposed to mycotoxins commonly found in stored feed and pasture. Unlike conventional binders, Elitox is formulated to target both polar and non-polar mycotoxins-without binding essential nutrients. This ensures effective detoxification while maintaining optimal nutrient availability, helping to protect gut health and overall performance.

settings.text_IW0mGvrr6MEGEAu6: *Results vary — some horses take longer to respond as their gut microbiome restores balance. If there are no obvious symptoms, changes may be subtle, like better hoof growth or immunity. Consistency is key. Long-term gut health, paired with the right diet and DigestiveHP, supports lasting performance and wellbeing.

settings.text_G5D8hhMh54CkTwff: What is best for my horse, DigestiveHP or DigestiveEQ?

settings.text_LDV1RtaJp6uuZopy: Don't just take our word for it. Hear it from our regular customers.

settings.text_8zFZKolrQBjDmS82: Real and honest reviews from horse owners using DigestiveHP

settings.text_fl7DxvKZOTbT8IiV:
DigestiveHP is a complete, premium gut health supplement, designed to maintain and strengthen equine gut health.

Benefits of great gut health are:

  • Healthier appearance and hooves
  • Happier, easier behaviour
  • Stronger appetite
  • Stronger immune system

When gut health is compromised, it can lead to reduced hormone and vitamin production, poor appetite, inefficient digestion and decreased energy supply.

Research continues to reveal the importance of a healthy gut, and the impact that can have on rider safety and overall horse welfare.

By providing nutrition that supports gut health, we can enhance a horse’s mental and physical well-being, improve behaviour, and optimise performance
settings.text_tfpL4NSC1a3kIMrR:
Whilst you may see similar benefits with these products, their intended usage is what makes DigestiveHP and StressPaste fundamentally different.

DigestiveHP is the daily gut-health supplement that supports your horse through their day-to-day stressors, to keep them healthy, happy and performing at their best.

Stress Paste plays best in instances of acute stress, designed to deliver immediate gut and nervous system support in the face of high impact events including competition, travel and extreme weather. Stress Paste is also recommended when first starting DigestiveHP to provide that extra buffer support at the very beginning.

Conveniently formulated in a concentrated paste, Stress Paste is easy to give ahead of known or predicted stressful events.
settings.text_CyX9ZT8W345O5MN9: How Soon Will I See A Result From Using DigestiveHP?
settings.text_mNn5DUV5WrfVqan1:
Horse owners who are using DigestiveHP often report seeing improved changes in as early as 4 weeks, with horses appearing calmer and more settled.

Another noticeable improvement is in the consistency of manure. Some horses that have been scouring for months have reportedly formed solid manure within days of using our digestive gut supplement.

In 2 months, horse owners are beginning to see improved top line and condition, particularly noticing filling out above the flanks around the loin area.

After 3-4 months people are consistently noticing significant behavioural, performance, and recovery improvements, as well as a noted improved suppleness under saddle and putting on weight.

If you don’t see a result that quickly, don’t panic. Every horse is different with some taking longer to respond due to repopulation of healthy microbes, particularly in their hindgut. If your horse doesn’t have obvious outward symptoms of gastrointestinal upset, positive changes are going to be less obvious but can be as subtle as improved hoof growth and increased immunity.

But remember, seeing the results is just the start. Supporting optimal digestion and the health of your horse’s gastrointestinal tract longer term with the correct diet in combination with DigestiveHP will ensure optimal health and performance into the future.
settings.text_cHJFYSp7xmlo8fx4: What Evidence Do You Have That DigestiveHP Is Effective?
settings.text_gNuoTksjNbXx6bh9:
As part of the research and design phase of our digestive gut health supplement, we initially conducted trials with an early formulation. This formulation was tested on a variety of horses across different disciplines, yielding consistent reports of improvements in condition, topline, behavior, manure consistency, performance, appearance, and stress resilience. Since then, the formulation has only improved, further enhancing these benefits.

Additionally, a separate field study was conducted by Professor Andrew Dart (BVSc PhD, Dip ACVS, Dip ECVS) from the University of Sydney, with a cohort of randomly selected horses. The results showed a remarkable increase in feed conversion, with some horses experiencing up to ninefold increases in weekly weight gain. Prof. Dart commented, "It is difficult to dismiss the relationship between weight gain and the addition of this supplement."

Ingredient selection is at the heart of what we do. In DigestiveHP, we only use raw ingredients that have been extensively researched across multiple species, meeting the highest standards of scientific evaluation. Each ingredient is carefully chosen based on its proven functionality, with inclusion rates aligned with research to ensure their effectiveness in equine health. While we don’t conduct the original research on individual ingredients, we source only those that are backed by robust science and incorporate them into a formulation designed specifically for horses.

DigestiveHP is now supported by testimonials from horse owners and receives strong support, recommendations, and endorsements from veterinarians.
settings.text_af1iEYEZEPSCMmd7: Yes it is. Like everything with laminitic horses, introduce it slowly, just to be on the safe side. Laminitis can be unpredictable, so slow is always best when adding something new to their diet.
settings.text_f0YTLmAAAtP7CaKH: Can DigestiveHP Be Fed To Pregnant and Lactating Mares?
settings.text_9DjSvkO8Bw5QRQNY: Yes, DigestiveRP can be safely fed to pregnant and lactating mares to support their gut health and potentially also their milk production. It should be fine for foals to nibble on a bit of their mother's feed containing DigestiveRP. However, as there aren't studies specifically aimed at foals for a majority of the ingredients, we can't recommend giving it as part of a foal's feed.
settings.text_qUimGcylgK3TnXvp: Is It Safe To Use With Other Supplements?
settings.text_NQdtIIWGID47Mmfv:
As DigestiveHP includes ingredients specifically designed to address gut health, it should be safe to feed alongside most other feeds and supplements. You may find that with the addition of DigestiveHP and a balanced diet with vitamins and minerals, your horse may not need additional supplements. For example, DigestiveHP contains a good amount of calcium, magnesium and a toxin binder, so if you are already feeding another supplement with those in it, you may find you can cut it out. No need to waste money on over-supplementing.

Please note that our supplements are not complete feeds and should be paired with a balanced diet and adequate amounts of forage.
settings.text_Ve61H6fTNhR7ixuK: How Long Will A 4kg Tub of DigestiveHP Last?
settings.text_guhgPp89CPFhlPGU: 4kg will normally last a 500kg horse 35 days.
